name: Abdul Rafay
headline: Computer Science Student
summary: Student of computer science with a strong foundation in programming, algorithms and software development. Passionate about machine learning, deep learning and generative AI. Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, and experienced in data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation with hands-on experience in building predictive models and working with real-world datasets.

education.description: Relevant Courses: Deep learning, Statistical Modeling, Artificial Intelligence, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Cloud Computing, Programming Fundamentals, OOP, Data Structures, Database Systems, Algorithms, Computer Networks.

projects.title: Video Frame Prediction using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a video prediction model that generates future frames from short input sequences using the UCF101 dataset. Implemented and compared three deep learning models: ConvLSTM, PredRNN, and a Transformer-based model to capture spatial-temporal patterns in videos.

projects.title: MLOps Environmental Monitoring and Pollution Prediction System
projects.description: Developed an MLOps pipeline to monitor environmental data (air quality, weather, and pollution levels) and predict pollution trends. Implemented DVC for versioning real-time environmental data collected from OpenWeatherMap and AirVisual APIs.

projects.title: Plant Species Classification using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model using CNN to classify plant species based on leaf images. Collected and preprocessed a dataset of leaf images, including resizing, augmentation, and normalization.
